services.title: Renewable Energy

content:
Welcome to a markdown rendered page from NetlifyCMS!

We can do formatting like **Bold** and *Italics*, we can make lists:

* With bullet points

1. Or numbers

and much more. 

Just note, because tailwind.css overwrites all the default element styles, you'll need to add css to render these properly, check the css/tailwind.css file for more.

 The data files are stored as JSON so that we get type inference for free with typescript.

main.title: What can we do for you today
main.body:
Loss of power? We'll have the kettle back on in no time!

Emergency works required?

Electrical testing?

PAT testing?

Or just require some advice? one of our friendly and professional team members will be happy to help

Call us - Same day response

Don't take our word for it, here are what our customers think about our service and what we did for them...

quotes.name: G J Gardener - Guildford
quotes.quote: Excellent electrician, Good price and outstanding work. I was really impressed with Ben's knowledge and customer service. Cleaned up as he went along and did an amazing job of fitting a brand new fuse board along with garden lighting design and install

quotes.name: M Wilcox - Bookham
quotes.quote: Great service from BWA Electrical, very prompt they were here within the hour of calling for emergency electrical works. Highly recommend them and their first class service

quotes.name: Alex J Jones - Weybridge
quotes.quote: BWA Electrical completed a full re-wire and re-fitting on our second floor electrical circuit. This included new fittings, holes, lights etc for 3 rooms. Their work was second to none. Faultless experience, helpful advice when choosing product and they were very tidy, efficient and polite. Highly recommended for any domestic or commercial needs.

quotes.name: L Woodall - Dorking
quotes.quote: Outstanding work from the guys at BWA they where polite and courteous. They gave us a quote before work started which me and my wife were happy with. Their work was of a very high standard and we were both very satisfied with it. They left out house tidy and clean after work was completed and where very conscientious about Covid-19 safety. We will be booking BWA again for more electrical works soon.

featured.title: 24 Hour Emergency call out 07415472578 or 07368132188
featured.description: Call us today and get a time and quote for any electrical based enquiry

slogan: Covering Surrey, South East, London, Sussex, Hampshire and more...
